definition: to water the plants/to water the garden
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: In my absence, please help me water the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 当我不在的时候，请帮我浇花。

sentences.english: Seeing rainbows through your yard sprinkler.
sentences.chinese: 用浇花器弄出来一道小彩虹。

sentences.english: Liu Tao waters the flowers every morning.
You water the flowers and clean the trees.
When you get home, do you potter about in the garden or sit in front of the television?
sentences.chinese: 回家后，你是在花园里浇花还是坐在电视机前？

sentences.english: Water after washing vegetable can be used to water the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 洗完菜的水可以用来浇花。

sentences.english: Invite a few people to seed your page, and then let organic growth take over.
sentences.chinese: 邀请几个朋友去你的个人主页浇花，然后顺其自然。

sentences.english: Grandpa takes her to his small garden. They water the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷带她去他的小花园，他们在那儿浇花。

sentences.english: After the water was boiling, Mr. Wang watered the flowers with it.
sentences.chinese: 水开后，王先生用开水浇花。

sentences.english: We needn’t have told him the news because he knew it already.
sentences.chinese: 你本来不必浇花的，因为天要下雨了。

sentences.english: What are your best tips for remembering to water plants?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么记住浇花的好建议吗？

sentences.english: Hours of gardening in the sun have quite tired me out.
sentences.chinese: 锄草浇花已使我十分疲劳了。

sentences.english: What do you often do on Sunday? I often water the flowers and listen to music.
sentences.chinese: 你经常在星期天干什么？我通常浇花和听音乐。

sentences.english: For instance, let’s say that you’re trying to build a habit of watering your flowers more.
sentences.chinese: 例如，让我们这么说吧，如果你想养成多浇花的习惯。

sentences.english: The old lady always sprinkles water on the flowers after sunset.
sentences.chinese: 那老妇人总是在日落后洒水浇花。

definition: fertilizer for potted flowers/fertilizer used to promote flowering in crop plants
to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method
